title: Star Wars: Tales, Vol. 4
description: Collecting issues #13-#16 of the quarterly anthology smash sensation, Star Wars Tales Volume 4 features an astonishing collection of stories featuring Jedi Master Mace Windu, Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Han Solo, and of course the big man himself—Darth Vader! Tales has explored every corner of the Star Wars galaxy and kept readers coming back for more! Star Wars Tales Volume 4 is sure to delight fans both young and old!
author: Dave Land
